description: {"blocks":[{"key":"7udf4","text":"This protocol describes how to freeze Adherent cells. Examples of these cells are: A549 cells, LLCMK2 cells, and MDCK cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"6s58q","text":"FREEZING MEDIUM: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a4aai","text":"90% of TCM ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6rlk4","text":"10% of DMSO","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8p57s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f55i5","text":"TISSUE CULTURE MEDIUM (TCM): Filter through 0.2 µm filter","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":28,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dl4ml","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"115q7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asvth","text":"DMSO (Dimethyl sulfoxide): Sigma-Aldrich Cat# D2650","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","0_2":"","0_3":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","1_2":"","1_3":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","2_2":"","2_3":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","3_2":"","3_3":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","4_2":"","4_3":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","5_2":"","5_3":""},"colTitles":["Component","Amount","Conc. Supp.","Product information"],"colWidths":["116","67","81","315"],"data":[["DMEM","500 mL","","Gibco Cat. # 11965092 (#11965118-cs)"],["Gentamicin","500 µL ","50µg/mL","Gibco Cat #15750060 (#15750078-pk) – 50 mg/mL"],["Sodium Pyruvate ","5.0 mL","1mM","Corning Cat #25-000-Cl – 100mM"],["L-Glutamine ","5.5 mL ","2 mM","Sigma Aldrich Cat #G7513 – 200mM"],["FBS","50 mL","10%",""]],"guid":"400208D5568A421384BCF21F15A7C0F1","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["DMEM","500 mL","","Gibco Cat. # 11965092 (#11965118-cs)"],["Gentamicin","500 µL ","50µg/mL","Gibco Cat #15750060 (#15750078-pk) – 50 mg/mL"],["Sodium Pyruvate ","5.0 mL","1mM","Corning Cat #25-000-Cl – 100mM"],["L-Glutamine ","5.5 mL ","2 mM","Sigma Aldrich Cat #G7513 – 200mM"],["FBS","50 mL","10%",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"693m6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7puna","text":"*Try to freeze cells at the lowest passage possible and confirm the cells are negative for mycoplasma before freezing. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"74sv8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4169","text":"Wash flask 2x with sterile 1X PBS.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b7h8i","text":"Add 2mL of trypsin/T75. Incubate at 37ºC for 2-3 mins or until cells are detached from the flask.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fem82","text":"Add 8mL of cell culture media and pipette up and down. Transfer all the media to a 15mL tube. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"np98","text":"Centrifuge at 1200 rpm for 5 min. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9mcq","text":"Discard supernatant and resuspend cell pellet in 1mL of cell culture media. Add 9mL of media and pipette up and down to homogenize. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"17q91","text":"Count the cells. You will need your cell concentration/# for step 6.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"49oor","text":"Spin the tube containing the cells in media again at 1200 rpm for 5 min. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d592f","text":"Meanwhile, prepare the freezing medium (see materials for recipe). Prepare the amount of freezing medium needed to dilute the cell pellet so that you have a final concentration of 1*106 cells/mL. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":184,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3id0d","text":"Discard the supernatant and resuspend the pellet in 1mL of freezing medium. Add the remaining volume of the freezing medium. Make sure you homogenize the solution well. ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8gbsu","text":"Add 1mL of freezing medium containing 1*106 cells/mL to cryotubes (caps screw from the outside). Label all the tubes with the following information:","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":42,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ube4","text":"Cell Name","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cg7vj","text":"Generation/Passage","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cpvl3","text":"Date","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7g9u8","text":"Name","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cnb24","text":"Cell concentration (if there is space)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":38}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cc1qe","text":"11. Transfer the cells to a Mr. Frosty Freezing container containing isopropanol and then transfer the container to the -80ºC for 1 day. After 1 day, transfer the tubes to the liquid nitrogen. You can keep some vials in the -80ºC for a couple of months, however, the -80ºC is not for long-term storage.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Freezing Adherent Cell Lines
